cmp: 巴 ((suff. for certain nouns)/to hope/to wish/Palestinian, Palestine (abbrev.)/Pakistan (abbrev.)/Pascal (unit of pressure))
mng: to hold, to contain, to grasp, to take hold of, handle, particle marking the following noun as a direct object, classifier for objects with handle, classifier for small objects: handful

exm.mng: to grasp (also fig.), to seize, to hold, assurance, certainty, sure (of the outcome)
to guard a pass, to check on sth
working hand, member of a work team, participant
to control, to dominate, to monopolize
to attempt all tasks at once, to manage every detail regardless of its importance
